data.location: SmartCity Kochi, Infopark road, Kakkand, Kerala, India.
descriptions: Designed and implemented scalable backend systems for large-scale applications with Laravel and AWS Lambda, managing over 100 million documents and enhancing system efficiency.
Optimized Elasticsearch indexing to manage millions of documents, reducing data retrieval time by 40% and improving query performance for large-scale applications.
Created and maintained containerized development environments using Docker, streamlining development workflows and improving deployment consistency.
Conducted code reviews to ensure adherence to SOLID principles, PSR-12 standards, and best practices.
Directed sub-projects such as building a Google Drive–style cloud storage platform, managing end-to-end architecture and implementation.
Developed reusable PHP packages encapsulating critical business logic, ensuring 90%+ test coverage and reducing feature development time by 25% through improved code modularity.
Utilized AI-assisted coding tools (Codeium, Cursor IDE) to accelerate development workflows, improving code quality and cutting development time by 30%
Led and developed two major projects, managing backend architecture, integrations, and team collaboration.

Built and launched a travel booking platform integrating hotel, flight, and activity APIs with PayPal and PayUmoney payment gateways, processing over ₹1 crore in transactions monthly and improving payment success rates by 25%.
Implemented multi-channel notification systems (Email, SMS, WhatsApp), enabling real-time customer communication and handling over 300 notifications per day with high reliability.
Integrated the backend for an IoT application using Django and REST APIs, enabling real-time sensor monitoring across devices with data refresh rates under 5 seconds.
Initiated and delivered over 25 CMS-based web projects utilizing Core PHP, CodeIgniter, and WordPress.
